text: Today, we celebrate the day of the alphabet in Byblos at 1100 at the Orezon complex with a selection of Arab poets

It is the season when cherry blossoms are in full bloom, but I think whether there are also people who suffer from hay fever. My friend and a capsule containing hydrogen Hugen hydrogen There are many people that Maxim seems to be good for hay fever. Believe do not believe it, but it is good news for those who are suffering from hayfever, I will tell you once.

Today I presided over a session of the Council of Ministers, in which we decided to accede to the Development Assistance Committee of the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) http://t.co/SjeB2rqvBI

The Committee includes the most important international donor organizations and countries, a global forum for development and the fight against poverty. Helping the poor and the needy always tops our agenda
Today we also adopted the appointment of the General Manager of the UAE Smart Government. We take the subject of smart services very seriously and aim to be world leaders in this field
We have adopted 6 new agreements with 6 countries to facilitate maritime and air traffic with the UAE. Thankfully, our economy today is a regional and international center for global trade
Very happy to welcome Pdt #XiJinping to the @EU_Commission today - a 1st in the history of our bilateral relations http://t.co/E1KhXjzljr

今天非常高兴能欢迎习近平主席到访欧洲委员会, 这是双边建交以来中国国家元首对欧盟总部的首次访问 http://t.co/hi6BqHrDjp

Pdt #XiJinping visit to Brussels is clear sign of a strong, successful & growing EU-China relationship

习近平主席对布鲁塞尔的访问，传递出欧中关系坚实、成功并不断加强的清晰信号
Today I chaired a cabinet meeting during which we approved the UAE to join the Development Assistance Committee within the OECD.
The committee is a global forum for development and poverty fighting which includes the most important organizations and donor countries.
We also adopted 6 new agreements with 6 countries to make sea and air mobility with the UAE easier.
We also approved appointing a general manager for UAE Smart Government. We are determined to be the pioneers in smart govt. services.

We announced today the results of government performance in Dubai for the previous year. As the companies announce their annual results, we also announce the results of our annual departments

17 years ago, managers gathered at the house of Sheikh Saeed .. and announced their results for the first time, starting from the worst performance for the best .. The shock of the beginning .. Then the wheel of excellence

Through 17 years we have distinguished circles .. And developed institutions .. And emerged to us energies .. And also honored those who could not continue in this race .. And will continue the journey of excellence
Another big part of our #LongTermEconomicPlan today: cutting Corporation Tax cut to 21%. A vibrant economy means more jobs and investment.
Tax relief for business investment doubled to £500,000 today. £99.8% of firms will pay NO tax on capital investment. #LongTermEconomicPlan
Fuel duty frozen again today - it would have cost 20p a litre more to fill up under Labour's plans. #LongTermEconomicPlan
